name: Axes (itch)
description:
Mess around with 3D Blocks to make 2D patterns and solve these puzzles that can have as many solutions as you can think.

You have the freedom to rotate the puzzle blocks as well as their constituent cubes as much as you want to form the solution patterns. 

All you have to do is work in two dimensions but think in three.

This game was made as a submission for 8 Bits to Infinity Puzzle Game Jam. 

Currently, it includes 15 levels. More levels will be added with each update.
